      static java.util.ArrayList<MemberAccounts> ReadMember()
      ReadMember() reads in the member.txt database and creates a new memberAccount for each member, along with the list of services they've been provided.
      static java.util.ArrayList<ProviderDirectoryEntry> ReadProviderDirectoryEntry()
      ReadProviderDirectoryEntry() reads in the providerDirectory.txt and stores each line as a ProviderDirectoryEntry and returns an ArrayList of these providerDirectoryEntries
      static java.util.ArrayList<ProviderAccounts> ReadProviders()
      ReadProviders() reads in the provider.txt database and creates a new ProviderAccount for each provider, along with the list of services they've provided.
      static void rewriteDirectory()
      rewriteDirectory() writes the providerDirectory to ProviderDirectory.txt.

      • ReadMember

        public static java.util.ArrayList<MemberAccounts> ReadMember()
                                                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                             java.io.IOException
        ReadMember() reads in the member.txt database and creates a new memberAccount for each member, along with the list of services they've been provided. This returns an arraylist of all the members in the database.
        Parameters:
        none -
        Returns:
        ArrayList of MemberAccounts

      • ReadProviders

        public static java.util.ArrayList<ProviderAccounts> ReadProviders()
                                                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                  java.io.IOException
        ReadProviders() reads in the provider.txt database and creates a new ProviderAccount for each provider, along with the list of services they've provided. This returns an arraylist of all the providers in the database.

        Returns:
